title: All the Backlist! August 3, 2018
description:
This week, Liberty discusses Eight Hundred Grapes, The Supernatural Enhancements, and more great older books.
This week’s episode was sponsored by Book Riot Insiders.
And don’t forget to enter to win 16 books from the Recommended podcast!
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS or Apple Podcasts and never miss a beat book.
Sign up for the weekly New Books! newsletter for even more new book news.
This content contains affiliate links. When you buy through these links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Books discussed on the show:
The Shortest Way Home by Miriam Parker
Eight Hundred Grapes by Laura Dave
This Body’s Not Big Enough for Both of Us by Edgar Cantero
The Supernatural Enhancements by Edgar Cantero
The Cheerleaders by Kara Thomas
Dare Me by Megan Abbott
The Tensorate Series by JY Yang
Dreadful Company (A Dr. Greta Helsing Novel) by Vivian Shaw
Strange Practice (A Dr. Greta Helsing Novel) by Vivian Shaw
Tropic of Kansas by Christopher Brown
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
